original_text: The hole in a needle is very small. A camel cannot go through it! But I tell you, it is even more difficult than that for a rich person to let God rule in their life.’
korean_text: 다시 너희에게 말하노니 낙타가 바늘귀로 들어가는 것이 부자가 하나님의 나라에 들어가는 것보다 쉬우니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: The hole in a needle is very small.
A camel cannot go through it!
it is even more difficult than that
for a rich person to let God rule in their life.'
sentences.korean_translation: 부자가 자신의 삶에서 하나님이 다스리게 하기 위해서입니다.'
